description:
This class, ConsoleWriter, resides in the Alcuino.ConsoleWriter namespace and offers a collection of methods to manipulate console output in various formats and styles. It facilitates writing text with specific colors, alignment, and typewriter-like effects. Here's a breakdown of its functionalities:

Typewriter Effects:

IsTypeWriterMode: Controls typewriter mode, simulating delayed text output.
TypeWriterSpeed: Specifies the speed of typewriter effects in milliseconds.
Text Output:

Write: Writes text with specified foreground and background colors.
WriteLine: Writes text followed by a newline, with specified colors.
WriteColumn: Formats text into visually appealing columns with alignment and colors.
Typewriter-like Output:

TypeWrite: Writes text simulating typewriter effects.
TypeWriteLine: Writes text with typewriter effects followed by a newline.
Headers and Error Handling:

WriteHeader: Creates centered headers with custom border styles and colors.
WriteError: Displays error messages with a red background and prompts the user to continue.
User Input:

ReadLine: Reads input from the user with a specified text color.
The class provides flexibility in managing console output styles, colors, alignments, and typewriter-like effects, allowing for visually appealing presentations and user interactions within the console environment.
title: ConsoleWriter
